movie.title: Sworn to Justice
movie.description_intro: Expert witness/psychologist secretly stalks her family's killers using E.S.P. While still under investigation by the police detective on the case, she falls in love with an attorney she comes to believe can lead her to the guilty parties.
movie.description_full: Expert witness/psychologist secretly stalks her family's killers using E.S.P. While still under investigation by the police detective on the case, she falls in love with an attorney she comes to believe can lead her to the guilty parties.

movies.title: Hell or High Water
movies.summary: In Texas, after the death of his mother, the unemployed oil and gas worker Toby Howard is losing his ranch to the Texas Midlands Bank. Toby is divorced from his wife who lives with their two sons. When his brother Tanner Howard is released from the prison, they team up to rob agencies of the Texas Midlands Bank to raise money to pay the loan so that Toby may leave the real estate to his sons. Meanwhile the Texas Ranger Marcus Hamilton who is near retirement and his Native American-descendant partner Alberto Parker try to anticipate the next move of the thieves.

movies.title: Yeom-lyeok
movies.summary: Seok-heon, a bank security guard, gains superpowers one day after drinking water from a mountain spring affected by a meteor. He then sets out to protect his estranged daughter Roo-mi and her neighborhood from a construction company controlled by the mafia, using his recently-arrived superpower: the power of psychokinesis, and in the process becomes a superhero.

movies.title: Bhoot: Part One - The Haunted Ship
movies.title_english: Bhoot: Part One - The Haunted Ship
movies.title_long: Bhoot: Part One - The Haunted Ship (2020)
movies.summary: When an abandoned and dilapidated ship called the Sea Bird mysteriously runs aground on the shores of Mumbai, one man is assigned to close the case. But the sinister stories surrounding the ship may have more truth to them than he previously thought.
movies.description_full: When an abandoned and dilapidated ship called the Sea Bird mysteriously runs aground on the shores of Mumbai, one man is assigned to close the case. But the sinister stories surrounding the ship may have more truth to them than he previously thought.

movies.title: Life of a King
movies.summary: Ex-felon, Eugene Brown, establishes a Chess Club for inner city teenagers in Washington, D.C.
movies.description_full: Ex-felon, Eugene Brown, establishes a Chess Club for inner city teenagers in Washington, D.C.
